website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable inline skates designed with beginners in mind.
pros: Easy for kids to put on independently
Wheels are designed to be slightly stiff so beginners and intermediate skaters don't lose control too easily
cons: Plastic locking clips could be more durable

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blades
customer_reviews.text: These rollerblades felt superior to roller derby brand mainly in the quality of the fasteners. Roller derby ones doesn't stay put for some reason, which is quite dangerous, so I decided to spend some extra on Chicago brand and I wasn't disappointed. My boys is size 3, so I bought 1-4, and they are spot on, don't think he could use them next year
customer_reviews.author: ShoeJunkie

customer_reviews.title: ... and you will be able to skate so much better. Dont settle for cheaper skates
customer_reviews.text: Pay a little more and you will be able to skate so much better. Dont settle for cheaper skates. Both my 9 year old son and I have these skates . Actually my son learned to rollerblade in these. We skate all over our park area and its great exercise and a lot of fun !
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Steyer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because they would probably hold up with less use. My son uses these daily. They fit well. I like that he can put them on without help. They just didn't hold up. We just ordered a new pair of another brand because the top strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Grau

customer_reviews.title: Great skates grow with your kid/teen's feet
customer_reviews.text: My kids use these skates and love that it will grow with their feet. I love that when a friend comes over, these are quick to adjust and resize for someone to borrow. They are sturdy and comfortable and we are super pleased with the value!!
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Great for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son might be more rough on skates than the normal kid- the one buckle broke, but it doesn't stop them from working. We were able to find a workaround. He uses these outside on the street/sidewalk and they have kept up with him.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 9 year old very comfortably, he generally wears a size 8 mens shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9 year old very comfortably, he generally wears a size 8 mens shoe. He has gotten many hours of good exercise with these, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lisa Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew (he's 7 y/o) and he absolutely loved it! It was so worth it and he says they're comfortable. The best part is that it's adjustable and he may use it for a while. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: johailyn

customer_reviews.title: Shoe detached from the Roller blade
customer_reviews.text: Although my kid liked the Roller blade in general, but the screw holding the shoe and the blade gets detached within a week of using the item. I don't see way to screw this back since the screw head is inside the shoe . I have decided to return the roller blades.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn these skate a total of 6 times. The second time he wore them we realized that the top strap didn’t latch so the skate was loose. Then, the last he was pulling the Velcro strap and the clasp broke off. We are so disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kids skates!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday gift for my grandson. He loves them. They fit great & will easily expand as his foot grows. They seem well made & sturdy. I would recommend for beginners or intermediate skaters.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, but we made it work.
customer_reviews.text: A little bummed that the mechanism to hold the Velcro broke after only a few wears. I have used a zip tie to make it work and it’s fine, but disappointed in the quality of the pieces that hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: foxytv

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been asking for rollerblades for months. These are a nice quality, and one of the reasons I chose them is because of the adjustable size. For the amount you spend on rollerblades, you don't want to be locked into one size for kiddos that are still growing. They have worked very well for him so far.
customer_reviews.author: Acakris

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old. He loves them. He says they fit really well, easy to put on and take off, and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Tr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the Quality
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase these again. On the second use, the plastic that holds the Velcro strap broke and the “ratchet” buckle broke. The shoe size adjustment seems to be the best feature. It is easy to adjust, but this is useless if you can’t secure them to your feet. I’m giving it one more shot with a replacement set. If there is any improvement, I’ll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: weird

customer_reviews.title: great skates
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved these skates. They are easy to adjust, he loves skating with them. He will be able to grow into them so I find it an economical purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Boys in line adjustable skates
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for the price! My grandson loves them! Awesome customer service from this seller also. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son to replace the pair that was broken when he went skating!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Skates
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 7 year old perfectly (he wears a size 1 shoe) they are comfortable and good quality, he hasn’t complained about sore ankles which has been a issue for us with inline skates in the past
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The skates are a very good quality skate. My grandson will get a lot of use out of them as they fit sizes 1-4. Great birthday gift at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Utz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good fit and good price.
customer_reviews.text: 9 yr old grandson loves them. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them. They should last a long time as they are good quality. Quick shipping. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Just1Me

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy quality.
customer_reviews.text: The top strap doesn't stay locked in, providing zero ankle support. The middle strap breaks with minimal pull to secure.
customer_reviews.author: Tara G

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic product
customer_reviews.text: The lock broke after the first use only The speed of the skates is not good even for the beginners Could not return it as used it after the returning window
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, but no good wheels quality
customer_reviews.text: These rollerblades are comfortable and fit pretty well, but the quality of the wheels is no the best. My boyfriend just used them for one month, twice or three times by week and now the wheels are no usable.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Great skates, very maneuverable and easy to turn. Easy to take on and off. Much better than my son's prior skates.
customer_reviews.author: ABB SD

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11 and uses these daily. He says the speed is so much better than his previous set and the skates are comoand durable
customer_reviews.author: Proudmommy

customer_reviews.title: Good but not durable if child will actually use them
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but definitely not durable for an active child. Child should be able to get more than 1 use out of the product. Unfortunately the plastic is a bit cheap and broke, which then made not use for the velcro to be secured.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing lace
customer_reviews.text: Came missing a lace. Wanting company to replace the lace rather than returning them. Hopefully you will see this review before we decide to return them
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing item...
customer_reviews.text: Rollerblade side adjustable straps do not thread and lock properly, leaving them unusable. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mum2lotz

customer_reviews.title: My son loved them! he wanted to go to sleep wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my almost 5 y.o. They look huge, but I was able to fit the lace tightly enough for his 12 size. My son loved them! he wanted to go to sleep wearing the skates)
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This made a very nice gift for him
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old son really likes them and uses them often. Packaging is well done. This made a very nice gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jake & Meghan

customer_reviews.title: The reviews don't lie!
customer_reviews.text: I debated buying these because I had not heard of the brand, and there were only 5 reviews. They are great skates. Much better than the ones Big 5 carries, and comparable price. Am glad I listened to the 5 other reviews :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: So good, we ordered again.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair I've ordered after being pleased with the first pair. My boys use them almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: Hailee

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates, but loop that the strap goes through ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates, but loop that the strap goes through broke first time skating. Don't seem to be very durable for 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: gardner

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for growing kids. My son got these for Christmas and loves them. They're adjustable and will grow with him so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust, easy to get on and off, and good quality wheels--a smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for a nice price! My 6 year old loves these! Seem to fit well and do not seem cheap or flimsy. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Does works beautifully!!
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that markings for size was scraped off of plastic by falling and learning to skate. I was letting other children try them and had difficulty re-sizing them correctly. Does works beautifully!!!! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap first use.
customer_reviews.text: The skates look good and are comfortable but the plastic loop for the Velcro strap snapped the first time he put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: These are very loose in the foot area. It offers no support and has way too much give.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a pretty good pair of skates
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a pretty good pair of skates. They do seem to run a little small. One of the wheels was pretty loose upon purchase, however 5 minutes with the allen wrench provided fixed that. My 9 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: These came w a plastic clip for the strap that goes over the skate and it was broke and is a very poor design for a rollerblade skate.
customer_reviews.author: Phoule

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo loves them. I like the adjustable size.
customer_reviews.author: ColleenJeremy

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Christmas present for my 11 year old son who wears a size 6 youth shoe. They are actually really light and easy to put on for him. I love the fact that they can grow with him due to the slider that allows you to change the size. He has been using them since Christmas and they are holding up great. He is hard on stuff so I am happy thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Lmiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son, he loves them and they adjust well
customer_reviews.author: empathybladder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates, Grandson loves them and so far they seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves, great that they adjust and he can put them on himself!
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Lindley

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pair of these skates. One pair works well. The other pair is being returned because every wheel on one of the skates was missing the bolt to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot that is easy and fast for a kid to put on. I like the size adjustability feature.
customer_reviews.author: H. Taylor Kendall

customer_reviews.title: good skates
customer_reviews.text: my 8 yr old son loves them, they seem well made, the adjustable part is easy to use, i am happy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: He can finally skate like a big boy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He can finally skate like a big boy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dodson

customer_reviews.title: On our second pair
customer_reviews.text: My son wore out the first pair! He loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Wore them every day for a month after he got them on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: None Yo Business

customer_reviews.title: Great skates especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great skates especially for the price. My son has gotten a lot of use out of them and they are holding up very well
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: screaming with joy, and sweat
customer_reviews.text: I have two boys- 8 and 6 year old, and they can't seem to get enough of these blades. The quality seems very satisfactory for blades at this price. My only beef is that the break doesn't look or appear to be replaceable? I'll have to figure that out when we cross that bridge. Overall, can't go wrong with these for the male child in your household- hours of endless falling, laughing, screaming with joy, and sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Everest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Direct from the mouth of the 11-y-o who got these for his birthday about a month ago: "I'd give them 5 stars because they're soooooo awesome!"
customer_reviews.author: Alice Swan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson really likes these, but did complain that the tongue slips down in the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good choice for b'day gift
customer_reviews.text: great gift for 6 year old grandson b'day gift - he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, like that they will fit a long time. Style was good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rieser

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to get these - we got them on a Friday and by Sunday the plastic on the strap had already broken and made them completely unusable. What a waste or money and disappointment to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is hooked!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 7 year old grandson's birthday and he cries when he has to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Rosenfeld Family

customer_reviews.title: good product for the price and I love that they ...
customer_reviews.text: good product for the price and I love that they are adjustable. The only problem we had was a screw came out under the bull of the foot on the inside and is difficult to get back in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old daughter. Easily adjustable. Very comfortable, and she can put them on herself.
customer_reviews.author: surfcity

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easily adjustable, love them.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, comfortable, adjusts easily. My son LOVES his new rollerblades. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Eley

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my son he loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my son he loves them. Easy to use and put on. And if you follow their size chart you'll have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was a gift for great grandson / He loves them
customer_reviews.author: Leroy A Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My sons first pair of roller blades and he loves them! I like the fact that they are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Coralis

customer_reviews.title: My son doesnt like it so I am using it now
customer_reviews.text: Finally it came! My son doesnt like it so I am using it now.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blades
customer_reviews.text: The size was good and I like how the are adjustable. They are good quality and my son has used them alot at the local rink.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor components - clips broke in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Clip to tighten rollerblade broke off after 3 weeks. Was a Christmas gift so now I can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Megan White

customer_reviews.title: and smelled like smoke. Currently awaiting refund
customer_reviews.text: These skates were used, already broken, and smelled like smoke. Currently awaiting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Strap/buckle broke first time out
customer_reviews.text: Top strap broke, just like others said. A shame because they are otherwise good skates. For the $, I feel,like the buckles should hold up better. It’s too hard to t7rn without support from the top strap and we can’t fix it. Will try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mb & B

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive on ankles
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap. Not supportive at the ankle and the strap broke within the 3rd ride. It was too late to return because i bought them before Christmas and he barely got to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: My son used these 3 times and the buckle has already broken.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Love that these expand for larger sizes. We can get lots of wear out of them. I wish the inner lining was a little thicker for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

product_meta.title: Chicago Blazer Junior Boys Adjustable Inline Roller Skate
product_meta.description: Tailored for the intermediate to advanced skater who is looking for torsional stiffness and superior performance while having a blast! With the Chicago Blazer Jr. Adjustable Inline Skates, attention to detail is matchless. Comfort begins in the boot liner, stitched for comfort and breathability. Enhanced by multi-size push button adjustments, the fit is sure to be right. Young speedsters will love the sleek look of these roller blades! Besides their stylish look, they also adjust easily to accommodate growing feet. Features a two-piece vented boot with pivoting collar. The nylon mesh inner boot delivers breathability. The speed-lace closures with micro ratchet buckle and power strap promises a better fit and secure feel. Kids’ will enjoy hours of speed and easy rolling! Excellent traction and stability delivered by the Nylon chassis with 70 mm 82a high-rebound urethane wheels with ABEC-3 rated speed bearings. Founded in 1905, Chicago Skates has been the leading brand in the skating industry for over 100 years. Today Chicago Skates remains the classic standard in quad roller skate industry. In addition to Chicago Skates’ popular classic quad collection, they have branched out into innovative inline skates, skateboards and other wheeled product lines and accessories. Shop with confidence; the Chicago Blazer Jr. Adjustable Inline Skates include a 30-day limited manufacturer's warranty. Available in adjustable youth sizes Medium (1 – 4) and Large (5 – 8).
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE INLINE SKATES: Enhanced by multi-size push button adjustments, these adjustable inline skates allow for effortless adjustments to ensure proper fit for growing feet. Adjusts 4 sizes (1-4).
FOR THE YOUNG SPEEDSTER: These skates are perfect for beginner to intermediate skaters who are looking for torsional stiffness and superior performance. Developed for fitness and designed for fun.
COMFORTABLE AND SECURE FIT: Nylon mesh inner boot delivers breathability, two-piece vented boot with pivoting collar, speed-lace closures with micro ratchet buckle, and power strap.
STABILITY & CONTROL: These high-quality speed skates provide excellent traction and stability, featuring nylon chassis with 70 mm 82a high-rebound urethane wheels with ABEC-3 rated speed bearings.
SPECIFICATIONS: Roll in style! The multicolor gray / black contrast stitching and trim give these boys’ skates a stylish sleek look. Size: Adjustable youth size medium (1 - 4).
